title: SignalUser
description: Details about the end user initiating the transaction (i.e., the account holder). When calling `/signal/evaluate` or `/signal/processor/evaluate`, this field is optional, but strongly recommended to increase the accuracy of Signal results.

<property-description>The user's legal name</property-description>

phone_number.description: The user's phone number, in E.164 format: +{countrycode}{number}. For example: "+14151234567"
